title: Dems: Filibuster Bad? NFTreats! 3.22.21
itunes:title: Dems: Filibuster Bad? NFTreats! 3.22.21
description:
In episode 841, Jack and Miles are joined by Smart Mouth's Katherine Spiers to discuss the filibuster fight, Sharon Osbourne claiming she was set up, more Game Of Thrones spin-offs, Chipotle's new quesadilla, Addison Rae, junk food coming for NFTs, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Republicans Know They’re Losing the Filibuster Fight
  2. Opinion: An intriguing reason that Republicans want to keep the filibuster
  3. "It will be Armageddon": Some Democrats fear midterm backlash without filibuster reform
  4. ‘The Talk’ producers ‘destroyed the show’ with Sharon Osbourne debacle
  5. ‘Game Of Thrones’: Sea Snake’s 9 Voyages Among Three More Spinoffs In Consideration At HBO
  6. Chipotle finally releases a quesadilla, and yes, it’s good
  7. WATCH: Best Addison Rae TikTok Dance Compilation 2020
  8. WATCH: Addison Rae - Obsessed (Official Music Video)
  9. Why Pringles Is Selling a Can of Chips You Can't Eat for $180
  10. The brands are at it again — Taco Bell is hopping on the NFT train
  11. Taco Bell Just Jumped On The NFT Bandwagon
  12. Pizza Hut Offers World's First NFT Pizza: Will Consumers Bite?
  13. Oh Great, Pizza Hut Is Getting Into the NFT Racket
  14. WATCH: The Weeknd - Crew Love ft. Drake (Shlohmo Remix)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
